sentences.en: A busy night in the restaurant can be frantic in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 餐馆晚上生意好，厨房里可能会忙成一片。

sentences.en: And while I'm out you might clean up the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候，你打扫一下厨房总该可以吧。

sentences.en: Come into the kitchen. I've got to put the roast in.
sentences.cn: 到厨房来。我得把烤肉放进去。

sentences.en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
sentences.cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

sentences.en: He moved all the caked and crusted dishes into the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他把所有长期没洗的餐具都拿到厨房。

sentences.en: He was frog-marched through the kitchen and out into the yard.
sentences.cn: 他被扭住双臂强推着走过厨房，来到院子里。

sentences.en: Heather went to the kitchen to get drinks for us.
sentences.cn: 希瑟去厨房给我们拿饮料。

sentences.en: His work jacket hung on the peg in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服挂在厨房里的挂钩上。

sentences.en: Nina and Mary were in the kitchen, cleaning up after dinner.
sentences.cn: 吃过晚饭，尼娜和玛丽在厨房里收拾。

sentences.en: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.cn: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.en: She hurried to the kitchen in back of the store.
sentences.cn: 她赶紧进到商店后面的厨房。

sentences.en: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
The original kitchen was sandwiched between the breakfast room and the toilet.
sentences.cn: 厨房最初夹在早餐厅和厕所之间。

sentences.en: The study links the main living area to the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 书房把主要的生活区与厨房连在一起。

sentences.en: There was a sound of loud voices from the kitchen.
They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

sentences.en: When I came round I was on the kitchen floor.
sentences.cn: 醒来时，我躺在厨房地板上。

words.tran_cn: 地方性的,区域性的,非正式的,不标准的,劣质的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式， 幽默)所有可想到的东西
n. 政府首脑的参谋团；厨房的餐具柜
激进现实主义；厨房洗涤池；厨房洗涤盆

trans.tran_en: the room where you prepare and cook food
the room where you prepare and cook food
